name: Ray Swims All Day v0.8
description:
You have found Ray, and he loves to swim!

In this endless runner, you will face multiple hazards that just want to ruin Ray's day!  How long can you keep Ray swimming?

Meet your enemies-

the humble hermit crab, a docile creature forever scavenging the sea floor in search of FOOD!

the dart fish, I wonder how he got his name? Seemingly a slow swimmer, but beware- you never know when this little guy may find a burst of energy.

Mr. razor fish,  he just stalks the ocean looking for any thing to gobble up.


The mighty piranha. It is said that these fish have a ferocious appetite, and can devour even the largest prey, in packs.

More enemies will be coming in the feature!

Ray's swimming is controlled with the directional keys(←↑↓→/WASD).

Ray can utilize many defenses to assist in helping him swim for as long as he can..

"Q" can be used to fire Ray's tail spear, wreaking havoc to any soft bodied enemies that it comes in contact with.

  

"Z" can be used to make Ray blow a bubble from his mouth, which has the ability to capture any weak swimming foes.

"C" will make Ray sharply inhale water through his gills, allowing him to eat small slow prey.

Holding down any of the attack keys will activate aiming mode. Use the up and down directional keys to aim.

If you find yourself in danger, Ray can use a burst of speed using the "space key", temporarily increasing his speed to escape. Be careful, Ray uses energy from eating to use this skill.

Thanks for showing interest in my game! This is my first beta release. Production will be on hold through the holiday's. I have many more ideas to add when my schedule slows down again. I hope you have fun playing, drop any comments below. I look forward to hearing from you.

Cory(cPi Studios)
